Docs.summary: A Class representing an AutomationPrivateEndpointConnection along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetAutomationPrivateEndpointConnectionResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetAutomationPrivateEndpointConnection method.
